cards.name: Void Siphon
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Gain 1 Corruption.
cards.flavorText: The void gives freely. It takes even more freely.

cards.name: Desperate Strike
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Take 2 damage.
cards.flavorText: Survival doesn't care about method.

cards.name: Scrap Shield
cards.description: Gain 6 Block. Exhaust.
cards.flavorText: Held together by rust and desperation.

cards.name: Quick Patch
cards.description: Heal 4 HP. Exhaust.
cards.flavorText: Not pretty, but functional.

cards.name: Scavenge
cards.description: Draw 1 card. If you drew a Common card, draw another.
cards.flavorText: One person's trash, another's survival.

cards.name: Wild Swing
cards.description: Deal 9 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavorText: Aim is a luxury.

cards.name: Corrupted Flesh
cards.description: Gain 3 Block. Gain 1 Corruption.
cards.flavorText: The body adapts. The soul pays the price.

cards.name: Makeshift Weapon
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. Exhaust.
cards.flavorText: Breaks after one use. That's all you need.

cards.name: Hunker Down
cards.description: Gain 12 Block.
cards.flavorText: Sometimes the only move is no move at all.

cards.name: Whisper of the Void
cards.description: Draw 1 card. Gain 2 Corruption.
cards.flavorText: It speaks. You listen. You shouldn't.

cards.name: Survivor's Instinct
cards.description: Gain 5 Block. Draw 1 card.
cards.flavorText: Stay alert. Stay alive.

cards.name: Cheap Shot
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. Apply 1 Vulnerable.
cards.flavorText: Honor is for those who can afford it.

cards.name: Void Touch
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Apply 1 Weak.
cards.flavorText: The void's caress drains strength.

cards.name: Hasty Retreat
cards.description: Gain 4 Block. Draw 2 cards. Discard 1 card.
cards.flavorText: Know when to run.

cards.name: Salvaged Blade
cards.description: Deal 8 damage.
cards.flavorText: Rusty, dented, deadly.

cards.name: Echo of Pain
cards.description: Deal 4 damage twice.
cards.flavorText: What hurts once can hurt again.

cards.name: Adrenaline
cards.description: Gain 1 Energy. Draw 2 cards. Exhaust.
cards.flavorText: The body has reserves. This empties them.

cards.name: Void Blade
cards.description: Deal 14 damage. Gain 3 Corruption.
cards.flavorText: Forged in nothing. Cuts through everything.

cards.name: Corruption Pulse
cards.description: Deal damage equal to your Corruption level.
cards.flavorText: The deeper the taint, the greater the power.

cards.name: Second Wind
cards.description: Gain Block equal to your missing HP.
cards.flavorText: Desperation makes its own armor.

cards.name: Calculated Risk
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If Unblocked, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: High stakes, high rewards.

cards.name: Abyssal Gaze
cards.description: Scry 3. Gain 1 Corruption.
cards.flavorText: Peer into the abyss. It peers back.

cards.name: Borrowed Time
cards.description: Gain 2 Energy. At the end of your turn, lose 2 HP.
cards.flavorText: Time loans come with interest.

cards.name: Feast on Weakness
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. If the enemy is Weakened, deal 14 instead and heal 4 HP.
cards.flavorText: The void teaches: prey on the failing.

cards.name: Cosmic Insight
cards.description: Draw 3 cards. Discard 2 cards. Gain 2 Corruption.
cards.flavorText: Knowledge has a price. This one's steep.

cards.name: Terror Strike
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Apply 2 Weak.
cards.flavorText: Fear is its own weapon.

cards.name: Void Communion
cards.description: Gain Block equal to your Corruption level. Gain 2 Corruption.
cards.flavorText: Embrace the void. Let it embrace you back.

cards.name: Reckless Abandon
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. Take 4 damage. Draw 1 card.
cards.flavorText: Caution died on the Dawnseeker.

cards.name: Shatter Reality
cards.description: Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies. Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
cards.flavorText: The fractures spread. So does the pain.

cards.name: Dark Bargain
cards.description: Gain 1 Energy. Gain 3 Corruption. Exhaust.
cards.flavorText: The Whisperers always accept new clients.

cards.name: Will to Live
cards.description: If HP is below 50%, heal 8 HP. Otherwise, gain 8 Block.
cards.flavorText: The body knows what it needs.

cards.name: Ancient Knowledge
cards.description: Draw 1 additional card each turn.
cards.flavorText: The Architects left more than ruins.

cards.name: Dark Pact
cards.description: Gain 2 Energy at the start of each turn. Gain 5 Corruption at the end of each combat.
cards.flavorText: Power now. Consequences later.

cards.name: Void Form
cards.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Gain 1 Corruption at the end of each turn.
cards.flavorText: The transformation has begun.

cards.name: Xal'Korath's Whisper
cards.description: Deal 20 damage. Gain Corruption equal to damage dealt divided by 4.
cards.flavorText: The World-Eater speaks. Reality shudders.

cards.name: Feed the Void
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If this kills an enemy, lose 5 Corruption.
cards.flavorText: The void hungers. Satisfy it.

cards.name: Reality Anchor
cards.description: Reduce all Corruption gain by 50%. Gain 1 Corruption now.
cards.flavorText: A piece of the old world, before the fractures.

cards.name: Martyrdom
cards.description: Take 15 damage. Gain 30 Block. Draw 3 cards.
cards.flavorText: Pain is just another resource.

cards.name: Entropy
cards.description: At the end of each turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to your Corruption level divided by 2.
cards.flavorText: All things end. You're just speeding things up.

cards.name: Seal Fragment
cards.description: Lose 10 Corruption. If Corruption is below 25%, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: A shard of what once held back the void.

cards.name: Beyond Death
cards.description: The next time you would die this combat, instead heal to 25% HP. Gain 10 Corruption. Exhaust.
cards.flavorText: The void doesn't let go easily.

cards.name: Seal of Matter
cards.description: Gain 3 Armor. At the start of each turn, if you have Armor, gain 5 Block and deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
cards.unlockCondition: Reinforce the Matter Seal in the Ironspine Wastes
cards.flavorText: A fragment of what binds physical form to reality. The Rust Titan's prison, now your shield.

cards.name: Seal of Time
cards.description: At the start of each turn, draw 1 additional card. Once per combat, you may take an extra turn (costs 10 Corruption).
cards.unlockCondition: Reinforce the Time Seal in the Eclipse Marsh
cards.flavorText: Causality bends around this fragment. The Witness once held it. Now you bear its weight.

cards.name: Seal of Light
cards.description: Corruption gain is reduced by 3 per turn. At the start of combat, apply 3 Radiance to ALL enemies.
cards.unlockCondition: Reinforce the Light Seal in the Radiant Highlands
cards.flavorText: Meaning made manifest. The Seraph's burden, purified and reforged.

cards.name: Seal of Identity
cards.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block. Whenever an enemy plays an ability, copy it as an Echo card.
cards.unlockCondition: Reinforce the Identity Seal in the Obsidian Thicket
cards.flavorText: The mask that holds selfhood together. The Whisper King shattered trying to wear it.

cards.name: Architect's Legacy
cards.description: At the start of each turn, choose one: Gain 2 Energy, OR Draw 2 cards, OR Gain 10 Block, OR Lose 5 Corruption.
cards.unlockCondition: Discover the Forbidden Archive beneath the Cradle Abyss
cards.flavorText: The sum of a civilization's knowledge, compressed into a single crystalline thought. They tried to fix the Pattern. They became the error.

cards.name: Xal'Korath's Hunger
cards.description: Gain 15 Corruption. Your attacks deal +1 damage for every 5 Corruption you have. Whenever an enemy dies, heal 5 HP.
cards.flavorText: The World-Eater offers a gift. You know the price. You accept anyway.

corruptedCardPool.description: These cards only appear at 50%+ Corruption or from Abyssal Whisperer events. They cannot be removed normally.

cards.name: Corrupted Strike
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. Gain 2 Corruption. This card cannot be removed from your deck.
cards.flavorText: It's part of you now.

cards.name: Void Embrace
cards.description: Gain 10 Block. Gain 5 Corruption. Draw 1 card.
cards.flavorText: It feels like home now.

cards.name: Herald's Gift
cards.description: Gain 2 Strength. Gain 10 Corruption.
cards.flavorText: The Heralds are generous. Suspiciously so.

cards.name: Reality Tear
cards.description: Deal 30 damage. Gain 8 Corruption. This card's cost increases by 1 each time it's played.
cards.flavorText: The seams of existence are fraying.

corruption.description: Cosmic taint from Xal'Korath's influence. Triggers escalating effects at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100% thresholds.

thresholds.effect: Reality fractures during combat, random modifiers
Transformation or death depending on path

vulnerable.description: Takes 50% more damage from attacks. Duration decreases by 1 each turn.

weak.description: Deals 25% less damage with attacks. Duration decreases by 1 each turn.

radiance.description: Holy damage over time. At the end of each turn, take damage equal to Radiance stacks, then reduce by 1.
